title: Between 1 October 2017 and 30 September 2018, will an armed group from Sudan engage in a campaign that systematically kills 1,000 or more civilians in Sudan?
preds: The government of Sudan is collecting arms from the factions. It will be unrest .
Based on general news and GJP consensus.

I see no chance of any such occurrence.

With world attention turned elsewhere, it is not inconceivable (a word which does mean what I think it means) that the authorities and their janjaweed pals will turn their attention to the surviving population of Darfur.
